Our Electrical Products

High-quality components for all your electrical needs

Circuit Protection

Circuit breakers, fuses, surge protectors, and safety switches designed to protect your electrical systems from overloads and short circuits.

Wiring & Connectors

High-quality cables, connectors, terminals, and wiring accessories for reliable electrical connections in any environment.

Energy Solutions

Energy-efficient lighting, solar components, and power management systems to reduce consumption and costs.

About RSH Electrical

Our journey in providing electrical excellence

  • 2005-2008

    Our Humble Beginnings

    RSH Electrical Products was founded by three electrical engineers with a vision to provide high-quality electrical components to the local market. Starting from a small warehouse, we served our first 50 clients with dedication.

  • 2012

    Regional Expansion

    With growing demand, we expanded our operations to serve the entire region, opening three new distribution centers and increasing our product range to over 500 electrical items.

  • 2018

    Embracing Green Energy

    Recognizing the shift towards sustainable energy, we launched our green energy product line, specializing in solar components and energy-efficient lighting solutions.

  • 2023

    Digital Transformation

    We launched our online platform and member portal, making it easier for our clients to access products, technical specifications, and personalized support.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!
